page.title: 04HOUSING NORMAL SPECIAL
page.content: {NORMAL HOUSING:}There is a variety of housing in Dornoch ranging from modern council houses to traditional private houses. Many of the older croft houses have been renovated to provide modern, comfortable homes. There has been an increase in private house building in recent years, mainly detached houses on individual sites or in small groups such as at Lonemore. At Bishopfield and Camore the local council have built more houses. There is a waiting list for council houses. {SPECIAL HOUSING:}Dornoch has a number of listed buildings and most of the older houses are large and are built of sandstone. Dornoch's most recent development is Stafford Court. It was built by the British Legion specially for retired ex-servicemen or their families. Some large old houses have been turned into shops and offices.
